movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: Top 3 for Me - ALL TIME
review: Where do i start? I love this movie so much! Just during quarantine I have watched this movie 3 times as of right now. Charlie is hugely relatable to me. All the plots all the characters they just click. They feel like real people. Its in my top 3 I love it so dang much. I cried throughout this movie.
